OCC:: I'm back for a shot while, after that cya tomorrow

::Blacknightmare::

"It's time to do my best" thought Blacknightmare and she said to 
Killfest "I'll try to get time"

She opened the comm link and Spoke with MEgatron "I was send by 
Predacon Commander Darkfate... I know that one  of the bots who're 
with you is Predacon Prime Minister Hell Beast... "

she fell in silence, she let at Megatron time to answer and tried to 
get more time


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> OOC-Im not moding, Ive lived on the ship for over a month, and if 
you will 
> read several back posts you will see I had Tarantulas get the codes 
before 
> killfest declared his dominace.
> 
>        Megatron stared at his chronokeeper. 5 minutes remained. If 
he failed 
> to contact him, Killfest was going to regret ever staging this 
pathetic 
> uprising. In the mean time, he watched his men pacing, guns in 
hand, waiting.
> 
>        Aracnia turned to see a fimiliar face. Gremlin entered the 
small room 
> that Quasar just left. Wiping the tears from her eyes, "What are 
you doing?"
>        Gremlin, in response, "Megatron sent me to get you....and to 
tel lyou 
> that Quickstrike is dead. They have him on the bridge. It would be 
suicide to 
> go in after him now."
>        A sudden shock went through her body. Quickstrike couldnt be 
> dead....he just couldnt. If Killfest wanted to play games with her, 
he was 
> going to lose, big time. "Were going to get him, and I dont care if 
i have to 
> blow half of this ship up to get him!"
>        "And how do you plan on doing that?" He asked, stupidly.
>        looking up, she said, "Just leave that to me."
